name: Shadows of the past (Egor)
description:
Hey all!

This game is about a bird. 
Please, look at your screen. I put UI for you.

AD - left-right 

S - get down through some blocks.

LeftMouseButton - attack

Escape-Q - pause menu.

You can't run.

This is the map:

Music and sounds were made by :

elmanana#2462

Programming and art were made by:

Egor Brag#6422
